alert.note: Alert for Bath; Montgomery; Rowan (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Watch issued August 06 at 3:32PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...FLOOD WATCH NOW IN EFFECT THROUGH SUNDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues to be possible. * WHERE...A portion of east central Kentucky, including the following counties, Bath, Fleming, Montgomery and Rowan. * WHEN...Through Sunday evening. * IMPACTS...Excessive runoff may result in flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Slow moving thunderstorms could produce locally heavy rainfall that leads to flash flooding. Areas that experience repeated activity will be the most susceptible to flash flooding. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be prepared to take action should flooding develop.
